entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Switch usage of `CallingConvention` field on `GeneratedDllImport` to `UnmanagedCallConv` attribute #61134
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow to await a SynchronizationContext or a TaskScheduler #61133
  • [mono] Create separate yml that can trigger full test runs on demand #61132
    7.0.0
  • Installer test infrastructure around the install_location config file on macOS crashes test process with RC2 SDK #61131
  • Invalid override of protected interface member via regular puplic member #61124
  • Analyzer: Replace occurrences of TypeInfo with Type and TypeInfo.GetTypeInfo() with Type.GetType() #61122
    7.0.0
  • ReadyToRun, PublishSingleFile=true, net 5.0 / 6.0 leaves native dlls out of bundle container #61120
  • Assertion failed 'm_dst->TypeGet() != TYP_STRUCT' with COMPlus_JitSkipArrayBoundCheck #61116
  • SslStream.Read behavior changes #61115
  • DateTime.TryParseExact returns false for "945" with pattern "Hmm" #61109
  • C++/CLI assembly is loaded into isolated AssemblyLoadContext (IsolatedComponentLoadContext) in .NET 6 #61105
  • ReadyToRun and Unicode class names #61104
  • [Runtime Store] conflict with dotnet command line #61103
  • [API Proposal]: Add support to override default event provider name for AddEventSourceLogger #61100
  • [API Proposal]: JsonBoolHandling #61097
    7.0.0
  • [mono] Improve handling of OOM #61095
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose a JsonSerializerOptions.Default property #61093
    7.0.0
  • X509Certificate.CreateFromSignedFile fails on Linux with ASN1 corrupted data #61092
  • Increase serialization max size or make it user driven for SystemTextJson #61089
  • A delegate object is created for each IOptionsMonitor<T>.Get call #61086
  • How to use dotnet.js outside of browser? #61083
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\TypeGeneratorTests\\TypeGeneratorTest1082\\Generated1082\\Generated1082.cmd #61082
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_26491/GitHub_26491_MultipleReturns/GitHub_26491_MultipleReturns.sh #61081

Closed

  • TimeZoneInfo.GetSystemTimeZones() returns empty list - Net6 Regression #61127
  • Make QCalls respect EntryPoint #59823
    7.0.0
  • Support reading/writing COSE_Key values #32080
    7.0.0
  • TypeBuilder::GetConstructor and GetField type checks are in the wrong order #45988
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] System.Security.Cryptography test failures #61099
  • [tracking]: Remove SafeFileHandle for Unix #61112
  • [wasm][aot] Link step failing for `System.Text.Json.Tests` - `wasm-opt` getting killed #51961
    6.0.0
  • Dynamic structure alignment by IntPtr.Size #61107
  • System.Memory.Tests failing in checked ARM64 #61084
    7.0.0
  • [RyuJIT][arm64] Recognize madd/msub #49283
    7.0.0
  • running AOT on a Blazor WASM app Error on .net Standard 2.0 dll #60612
  • GetAbbreviatedDayName in Portuguese #61088
  • Importing .vsconfig shows an error #60794
  • net6.0-android app crashes in release mode when instantiating HttpClient #60896
  • HTTP2 loopback server WaitForCancellationAsync should validate error code sent #58235
    7.0.0
  • [Android] Mono runtime should always ask Xamarin.Android to load native shared libraries #37303
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json inconsistent behavior using JsonExtensionData on JsonObject #61080
  • System.IO.Pipelines.Pipe.ReadAsync fails to cancel on CancellationToken #58909
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: Support DateOnly and TimeOnly members #61098
  • DataMisalignedException thrown when using MemoryMarshal.Cast<byte, double> on correct data #61096
  • ImmutableDictionary.ContainsKey is few times slower than Dictionary.ContainsKey or even ConcurrentDictionary.ContainsKey #29088
    Future
  • ICorProfilerCallback11 typo #60965
    7.0.0
  • Test failure profiler/elt/slowpatheltleave/slowpatheltleave.sh #60665
    7.0.0
  • SslStream: Don't include "NT AUTHORITY" in Distinguished Names list of CertificateRequest. #60949
    7.0.0
  • Native dependencies in Blazor WebAssembly - Issue when try use a callback from C++ #60824
  • [Tizen ] X86 Linux CI for pull requests #60452
  • [7.0] microsoft.net.workload.mono.toolchain\WorkloadManifest.targets hardcodes net6.0 as TFM #60745
  • Test failure DllImportGenerator.UnitTests.ConvertToGeneratedDllImportAnalyzerTests.TypeRequiresMarshalling_ReportsDiagnostic(type: typeof(System.ConsoleKeyInfo)) #60950

PullRequests

Created

  • [DllImportGenerator] Switch away from setting CallingConvention field on GeneratedDllImport #61130
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Remove dead code in jit #61129
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Deduplicate tests with class name 'BringUpTest' #61128
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix setting pipe used in PAL_ProbeMemory as nonblocking #61126
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Deduplicate runtime tests using the class name 'Test' #61125
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [WIP] Enable stress log on Linux #61123
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Fix and optimize llvmonly+gsharedvt code generation #61117
  • Credential fixes #61114
    area-System.Net
  • Fix value numbering of field assignments #61113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update branding for 5.0.13 #61111
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Skip sys/sysctl.h on linux in mono #61110
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix invalid optimization of (-1 * -A) + A #61091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan<T> #61079
    new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Make QCalls respect the EntryPoint property #60992
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add back SoD Blazor Pizza Aot test #61118
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Avoid bogus cred scanning hits #61070
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Switch to run only smoke tests per PR for apple mobile configurations #61108
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix: Incorrect order of checks for TypeBuilder `GetConstructor` and `GetField` method #53645
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Disable failing System.Security.Cryptography tests due to http… #61102
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • Disable couple of randomly failing PerformanceCounter tests #61101
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [wasm] Re-enable source generator tests failing due to OOM #60701
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Throwing `FormatException` when a required property from `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel` is empy #60842
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • [arm64] JIT: Fold "A * B + C" to MADD/MSUB #61037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Some VN refactoring #61034
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Removed two unused packages from .vsconfig #60798
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Seed the unified System.Security.Cryptography.dll #61025
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • HTTP2 loopback server WaitForCancellationAsync should validate error code sent #59313
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build #60675
    community-contribution
  • revert 58594 CacheCredential change #61069
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Temporarily disable scaled index on arm64 #61090
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix typo in profiler method #60999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [arm64] JIT: Fix IsContainableImmed for arm64 v8.1 or higher #61035
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • disable sending NT Authority in TLS handshake if specific trust was specified #60988
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add Maui iOS and MacCatalyst build steps #61068
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add linux x86 build CI for pull request #60817
    * NO MERGE *, community-contribution
  • Make sure smoke tests aren't run on the rolling build #61055

Updated

  • [arm64] JIT: Recognize sbfiz/ubfiz idioms #61045
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update SDK to 6.0 RC2 #60256
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make WeakReferenceCollection thread safe #61054
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • Add TFM and version support query to marshaller interface. #61064
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • JIT: limited version of forward substitution for some relops #61023
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] simplify startup configuration #61072
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Arm64: addressing modes #61026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix refcount when a composite r2r image is loaded from a bundle #61066
    area-Single-File
  • POC src/tests tree test xunit-based source generated runner #60846
    area-Infrastructure
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Prototype mark overflow fix for regions #60646
    area-GC-coreclr
  • lock protect nullability cache of symbolic regex node #60942
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Remove _validator field from ObjectCollection #59589
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Fix inconsistency in p/invoke arguments introduced when switching some to be blittable #61071
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Request CachePolicy isn't applied in HTTP request header #60913
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • [mono] Add mono_class_get_special_jit_flags and MONO_SPECIAL_JIT_DEFER_CLASS_INIT_TO_CTOR #60987
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix x86 stackwalk for UnmanagedCallersOnly #61075
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [mono/win] Increase stack size (reserve) to 8MB #60561
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Change dotnet.wasm link optimization #60632
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0.1] add support for macOS 12 #61028
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.1
  • [mono][interp] Fix GetType called on ptr constrained to Nullable` #61020
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [JIT] Optimization for left-shift operator #52297
    needs more info, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix BigInteger.Parse returns bogus value for exponents above 1000 #55397
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix time-of-use vs. time-of-check "bugs" #60860
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Experiment with Unsafe.StackAlloc<T> #60428
    area-Meta
  • Use SIMD operations in genCodeForInitBlkUnroll and increase INITBLK_UNROLL_LIMIT to 128 bytes #61030
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Remove sorting requirement for interface lists #60541
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0

Created

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 6.0 - ReceiveAsync not working #22428

Closed

  • `dotnet workload` commands do not authenticate properly #21802
    6.0.2xx
  • dotnet 5.0.402 doesnt install sdks but only runtimes #22432

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding for 5.0.404 #22445

  • Update branding for 5.0.210 #22444

  • Update branding for 3.1.416 #22443
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Versions.props for 6.0.101 and servicing #22442
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #22430
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cleanup NoWarn duplication by moving its handling to the Suppression Engine #22426

Merged

    Area-Workloads
  • [Port to 6.0.2xx] Fix run warning output formatting issue #22350
    Area-CLI

Updated

  • Rocky Linux support #21029
    Area-Infrastructure

  • [Port to 6.0.2xx] Update System.CommandLine version #22351

  • Add tool install implicit RIDs #22331
    Area-Tools
  • Add support for `--arch` #22180
    Area-DotNet Test

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inline diagnostics should be delayed until after a user is done typing #57533
  • IDE should cache source-generated docs so that they are available for subsequent sessions without recomputation. #57532
  • Update tests for NoneOperation with type #57531
  • Incorrect nullability warnings for new interpolated string handlers #57528
  • Avoid setting MICROSOFT_DIASYMREADER_NATIVE_* env variables in tests #57526
    17.1
  • Roslyn Produces Abnormally High CPU Utilization When Many Files Are Open #57525
  • VS Code CleanUp Setting 'Add Access modifiers' removes overloads in VB.Net Files #57524
  • IDE0072/IDE0010 does not get properly reported (e.g. no `(TEnum)0` when `Nullable<TEnum>` gets switched and `null` case is present) #57523
  • Type inference fails for Func<Expression<Func<T>>> #57517
  • Code Navigation bar does not show event handlers in VB Winforms App #57516

Closed

  • AsynchronousOperationListener throws a lot of TaskCanceledException during typing test #57527
  • Protected interface member: disabled implicit implementation causes error "CS8704" #43680
  • CSharpSquiggles tests are failing on .Net Core Servicehub host #57395
    17.1
  • Roslyn generated executables cannot be run without the dotnet command #57347
  • IDE0072 does not report '(TEnum)0' when 'null #57522

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify nav-to implementation. #57534
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57530
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Make indentation API async #57529
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57521
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Track AbstractFlowPass.PendingBranches by label #57520
    Area-Compilers
  • proposed document pull diagnostics implementation #57518
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Build CodeAction description into table and only generate Dev17 hash #56860
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Ensure only one storage service factory gets created per workspace. #57513
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Avoid recomputing expensive persistence location data that does not change. #57511
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57519
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57498
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57515
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merges/main to features/param nullchecking #57512
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57499
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.1 #57496
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • When we're loading dependencies, don't require exact versions #56432
    Area-Analyzers
  • StackFrame Parser/Lexer as EmbeddedLanguage #56957
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57506
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57505
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add Visual Studio 2022 Editor Color Scheme #57138
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Fix for "Function pointer invocation has "None" IOperation" #57191
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Cache the stale syntax-indices we load prior to OOP being fully hydrated. #57514
    Area-IDE
  • Interpolated string handlers in the CFG #57483
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57462
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [DNM] Testing pool provider changes - Redirect Roslyn PR to Helix Staging #56910
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update SymReader packages to the latest #57458
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix generator caching in compiler server #57177
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • adding draft of detailed spec #57346
    Area-IDE
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.9-vs-deps #57508
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to 1ES R&D pools on main #57481
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.11-vs-deps #57482
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers
  • Benchmark for Inheritance Margin #57445
    Area-IDE
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • Respond to cancellation when a generator is running, so we can still report time. #57122
    Area-Compilers
  • MSBuildWorkspace Add Reload Apis #52554
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor wasm .NET 6 rc2 unable to use RegisterForJavaScript RootComponents when publishing #38044
  • Reconsider EditorForAsync/DisplayForAsync for ASP.NET 7 #38043
  • .NET 6 Blazor typeparam constraints causing compilation error #38041
  • How to authorize SignalR Hub for both Identity Role OR JwtBearerDefaults.AuthenticationScheme? #38039
  • Startup improvement: connectionclose #38038
  • .NET 6 Blazor Hot Reload fails depending on the port specified for the application Url #38029
    6.0.x
  • project Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Razor build fail #38028
  • [Breaking change]: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Transport.Libuv and Libuv.dll removed from 7.0 #38022
    Discussions
  • Virtualize: Accessibility (scrolling by keyboard) is broken when using ItemsProvider #38020
    6.0-docs-infra
  • WebAssembly RemoteRegisterPath/RemoteProfilePath don't work on an external origin #38015
    Backlog
  • Startup regression: json #38012
  • POST_ClientCancellationBidirectional_RequestAbortRaised(protocol: Http2) test failure #38008
  • [Feature Request] Better support Dependency Inversion with SignalR Core #38007

Closed

  • TypeNameHandling not working with abstract classes: "Type specified in JSON 'T' was not resolved." #37986
  • Flaky Test: Timeout for RequestTests.ConnectionClosedTokenFiresOnServerFIN(listenOptionsName: "Loopback") #37750
    Next sprint planning
  • Test Failure: `ConnectionClosedTokenFiresOnServerAbort` #35686
    Backlog
  • Correct `ConnectionNotClosedWhenClientSatisfiesMinimumDataRateGivenLargeResponseHeaders` test #26306
    Next sprint planning
  • ConnectionClosedTokenFiresOnClientFIN fails due to timeout #23043
    Next sprint planning
  • Test failure in WritingToConnectionAfterUnobservedCloseTriggersRequestAbortedToken #33455
    Next sprint planning
  • Blazor server-side project with windows authentication does not work from command line #23145
    6.0.0
  • Blazor: Hot reload and WASM pre-render do not work together #33320
    6.0.0
  • Blazor Child Components Refresh when InputText onchange fires #38021
  • dotnet watch run does not reload application in a Blazor wasm app #37708
    6.0.x
  • Hot Reload with dotnet watch run doen't work. The call /_framework/blazor-hotreload returns status 204 #36745
    6.0.0
  • Add fsi to dotnet watch #38037
  • MetadataUpdateHandlerAttribute callback not invoked in .NET 6 Preview 5 #37100
  • Blazor DI Service required #38023
  • File Upload with <InputFile> creates corrupted file in ASP.NET Core 6.0.0-rc.2.21480.5 #38019
  • [dotnet-watch] Hot Reload - Provide a way to suppress rude edit dialog #37023
  • HotReload - Blazor WA - is not working with Radzen components #37498
  • Document How to Enable Hot Reloading Using dotnet run/watch #38036
  • [API Proposal]: Support dotnet watch in launchSettings.json #37896
  • Startup improvement: json #38013
  • Perf regression: updates #37975
  • Need to have a way to indicate whether a component uses attribute-splatting or not #21564
    .NET 7 Planning
  • In Blazor project when exception is thrown in the markup part of .razor component then VS should show WHERE in the markup the exception was thrown. #21782
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Improve the error experience in a wrong binding situation #21950
    .NET 7 Planning
  • RouteConstraints aren't linker friendly #24723
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Memory leakage when using 'return' during rendering logic #27429
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Drawn controls support for Blazor #37281
    Backlog
  • Remove Libuv transport #38002
    7.0-preview1
  • ServerCanAbortConnectionAfterUnobservedClose-Loopback test failure #37990
  • Flaky test - WriteAfterConnectionCloseNoops-http_127.0.0.1_0 #36931
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Slightly flaky test: `UnixDomainSocketsTest.TestUnixDomainSocketWithUrl()` #28067
    Next sprint planning
  • blazor-wasm publish missing Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.dll #37994
  • Expose Use(Func<RequestDelegate, RequestDelegate> middleware) on WebApplication #37346
    7.0-preview1
  • Blazor WASM RTM 3.2 with Identity Server fails if app name contains period '.' #22071
    Backlog
  • Add "show all routes" command line tool #15206
    Backlog
  • Question: Automatically registering routes for 3.0 #14469
    Backlog
  • ILEmitTrieFactory isn't linker friendly #24725
    .NET 7 Planning
  • WebApplicationBuilder does not canonicalize the --contentRoot argument #36416
    6.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/2.1] Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #38042
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, feature-installers, 2.1.x
  • Fix for remember browser #38040
    area-identity
  • Update branding to 6.0.1 #38027
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Add attributes to SignalR source generator #38025
    area-signalr, api-suggestion
  • Update Chrome and Selenium Versions #38024
    area-infrastructure
  • Modify Mvc.Analyzer tests to use Roslyn test infrastructure #38010
    area-mvc

Merged

  • [SPA] Updates npm dependencies #37776
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 3.1.22
  • Improve linker friendliness for RouteOptions #38014
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Update branding for 5.0.13 #38031
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.13
  • [release/2.1] Include SharedFx bundle in Hosting Bundle, instead of SharedFx .msi #36890
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.31
  • Update branding for 3.1.22 #38030
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.22
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3b49be0` to `16f637f` #37979
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.22
  • Add default values to the documentation #38017
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Add default value to documentation #38018
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/2.1] Use new Hosted build pools #37159
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.31
  • [release/3.1] Only dispose WindowsIdentity in LongPolling #37819
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 3.1.22
  • Unquarantine shared tests #38026
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Add warning when targeting release/* branches #38006
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Make in-memory HTTP/2 tests more deterministic #37948
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Remove Libuv transport and dependency #38005
    breaking-change, area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Expose Use as a public method on WebApplication #38011
    area-runtime, feature-minimal-hosting, 7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine flaky tests #38009
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Update SDK #38001
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • [SPA] Update NPM dependencies #37739
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3b49be0` to `16f637f` #37980
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [release/5.0] Only dispose WindowsIdentity in LongPolling #37818
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 5.0.13

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Database First: Keeping EF Core Models In Sync #26519
  • Defect: Select after projection behaves unexpectedly in Azure Cosmos DB provider #26517
  • Convert more unit tests to use DI #26510
  • Review use of EF internal code in relational, providers and extensions #26508
    MQ
  • Sqlite Spatial: dotnet 5.0.11 crashes when loading Spatial Extension #26507
  • Delay entity state changed event until all property changes have been detected #26506
    Backlog
  • Owned type w/ uni-directional HasMany #26505

Closed

  • [Minor/Convenience] Creating classes from model snapshot. #26492
  • Be consistent about not using the Exception parameter of ILogger #19045
  • Proposal: prevent generating a default DbContext constructor when using dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold --no-onconfiguring #23515
    7.0.0
  • Insert record sequentially in DB without identity on PK #26480
  • Visual Studio assumes return value from FirstOrDefaultAsync() cannot be null #26485
  • When removing the relation of a parent/child entities with Foreign key as string, the child is deleted without notification. #26473
  • when i use EF.CompileAsyncQuery((DbContext db, Func<TEntity, bool> filter) => db.Set<TEntity>().Where(filter)),there has been an error #26402
  • TagWith/TagWithCallSite with lazy loading tags only first query #26474
  • Bug occurs when one-to-one with optional navigation property #26489

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #26518
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #26516
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26515
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Set default capacity of prepared Statements #26514
  • Evolve null-checking approach in EFCore.InMemory #26509

Merged

  • Update branding for 3.1.22 #26512
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Update branding for 5.0.13 #26513
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Update branding to 6.0.1 #26511
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Do not scaffold a default constructor when OnConfiguring is suppressed #26470
    community-contribution
  • Evolve null-checking approach in EFCore.Design #26481

Updated

  • Add Migration name check #26396
  • [6.0.1] Allow non-nullable value comparer to be applied on nullable properties #26430
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1
  • [6.0.1] Query: Copy client projections when updating SelectExpression #26431
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.21.0 to 3.22.1 #26503
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Change timer from method variable to property of SqlConnectioninteral #26495
